name: Disharmony Blocks 2
description:
Travel back to a time and place where emotions exist as real sentient beings, something is causing disharmony in the land on Sundast and only you can find out what.

As a newly qualified Harmony Sage it is your job to travel the land and help bring the Disharmony Blocks under control and discover what other nefarious forces are at work here.

Bright & Colourful Graphics

Master Powerful Emotional Outburst Spells

Spell & Perk Upgrade System

75 Levels of Match 3 Fun
